The charming coastal town offers ideal conditions for families with children and water sports enthusiasts with its calm, shallow water.

expose/apartment.headline: Holiday Apartment Los Alcázares Mar Menor - Luxury Apartment Puerto Marina Murcia

description.1: The apartment accommodates up to four people. It has three rooms, two bedrooms, a living room, a bathroom and an American-style kitchen. A highlight is the balcony where you can enjoy the evening sun from 6:00 PM. The apartment is fully equipped with kitchen utensils, towels and bed linen. It has German television and an Amazon Fire TV Stick. It is located on the first floor and is also accessible by elevator.
description.2: The complex features a beautiful interior area with three pools, two of which are disabled-accessible. Palm trees frame the complex and create a Caribbean atmosphere. The ideal place to relax.
description.3: We provide our guests with sun loungers for pool use. We only ask that you return the loungers to the apartment from the pool area at the end of the day. Please also note that glass in any form is not allowed in the pool areas.
description.4: The residential complex impresses with its central yet quiet location. As a closed, secure and private residence, it is only a few minutes' walk from the beach, shopping, bars and restaurants - a car is therefore not necessary if you prefer to walk.
description.5: Perfect infrastructure in the immediate vicinity:
description.5/1: Supermarkets (Lidl, Aldi, Mercadona): only 150 m away
description.5/2: Famous pedestrian zone of Los Alcázares with the 525 Plaza: 120 m - here you can expect restaurants, evening dance bars, live music and numerous hippie and vendor stalls
description.5/3: Sea with the picturesque beach promenade and diverse restaurants: 950 m
description.6: Our holiday apartment offers you the ideal starting point for an unforgettable holiday at an attractive price-performance ratio.
description.7: Important note: Pets are not allowed in the residential complex.

description.1: Los Alcázares is a popular holiday resort on the sunny Costa Cálida in the Spanish region of Murcia. Located directly on the beautiful Mar Menor, Europe's largest saltwater lagoon, the resort offers perfect conditions for a relaxing and active holiday in Spain.
description.2: With around 7 kilometers of fine sandy beach, calm, shallow water and a mild climate all year round (average 20°C), Los Alcázares is the ideal travel destination for families, couples and active holidaymakers. Particularly popular is bathing in the Mar Menor, whose iodine-rich saltwater is known for its therapeutic effects - ideal for skin, respiratory and joint problems. A natural spa right on your doorstep!
description.3: Our holiday apartment in Los Alcázares is located just a few meters from the beach and is excellently accessible: Murcia-San Javier Airport is only a few kilometers away, Alicante Airport can be reached in about 50 minutes by car.
description.4: Experience a perfect combination of relaxation, sport and Spanish lifestyle in Los Alcázares:
description.4/1: Water sports opportunities such as sailing, windsurfing, kitesurfing, kayaking, stand-up paddling
description.4/2: Modern sports centers with tennis, volleyball, squash, fitness, football and much more
description.4/3: Local specialties from Murcian cuisine in numerous restaurants and tapas bars
description.4/4: Historical sights and exciting excursion destinations in the area
description.5: The city offers excellent infrastructure with supermarkets, pharmacies, international schools, medical care, golf courses and a reliable bus service along the coast.
description.6: For golfers, the region is a paradise: nearby there are over 15 golf courses, including the well-known La Manga Club, one of Europe's best golf resorts.
description.7: Whether you are looking for a beach holiday in Spain, an active golf holiday on the Costa Cálida or simply relaxation with the family - Los Alcázares offers the best conditions for an unforgettable stay.

description.1: According to the house rules of the Puerto Marina complex, it is not permitted to dry towels on the balcony. Please use the available drying rack instead.

We, Olaf and Tina, had long dreamed of emigrating to Spain. Olaf is half-Spanish, his mother comes from the Murcia region. We have owned an apartment in Los Urrutias for years. In 2024, we then took the plunge, sold everything in Germany and emigrated completely to Spain. We are self-employed here with a small German service and now want to give others the opportunity to get to know the flair and lifestyle of this area.
description.2: We love this country and want to inspire others about it too. It is important to us that we as landlords are always on site and available as contact persons. The rental is handled by us personally. This means for you as our tenants that we carry out a final inspection (when tenants depart), so that it is ensured that you will not experience any unpleasant surprises upon arrival and the apartment is in perfect condition.
